title: Under the gun for a deadline: Weird 'g'
content:
Weird g in the enclosed example, but I can't tell if it's in the printing or in the font.

Sorry about the bad reproduction...Can anyone identify?

Thank you--
author: Frost

comments.content:
Sorry...I'll keep trying...hang on...thanks much

Ho-kay, try this...thanks
